MESSAGE.value:
Bug Fix:
-Fixed blood splat not working after previous update.
Fixed screen flashing glitch and tweeked projectiles
Fix bug created by previous commit

Make player killable
Enemies can now kill the player. However enemy AI is now a bit off and they sometimes behave very oddly. Hopefully a fix will come with the next commit.
